entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 8:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa steady
Visibility: 13 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 5.8°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
